dict.acceptation: 不管；尽管（自己）不愿意；不在乎；虽有；
侮辱；憎恨；怨恨；轻蔑的拒绝或不承认；

sent.orig: Those proposals inferiorated proposals infuriated Russia, despite despite.
sent.trans: 而这些提议激怒了俄罗斯。

sent.orig: Despite what everyone says no one wins the league by Christmas, I beg to differ.
sent.trans: 尽管所有人都认为，没有哪支球队能够在圣诞节就确保夺冠，但我却有不同的看法。

sent.orig: The young blue-skinned commander was able to decimate the intruders despite inferior weapons and numbers.
sent.trans: 虽然在武器的数量和质量上都处于劣势，但这个年轻的蓝皮肤指挥官还是给入侵者造成重创。

sent.orig: Despite interest in his book, the territory's former governor remains a divisive figure.
sent.trans: 尽管不少人对他的书感兴趣，这位前香港总督仍然保持了制造不和谐气氛的形象。

sent.orig: Yet despite their ubiquity remarkably few non?engineers have heard the word "embedded" used in this context.
sent.trans: 放眼望去，可以肯定，你会很快在你的家中发现几十个嵌入式系统，在你身上至少也能发现几个。
